name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior FHIR Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, I excel in leveraging **FHIR**, **HL7**, and **RESTful API** standards to deliver high-performance solutions specifically within the healthcare sector. I possess strong proficiency in **Java**, **C#**, and **Python**, coupled with proficient use of **JavaScript** frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue** for frontend development, as well as **Node.js** for backend services.

My cloud experience encompasses deploying applications on **Azure**, **AWS**, and **GCP**, ensuring robust and compliant solutions in line with HIPAA and FHIR standards. I have successfully integrated systems with **Epic EHR** and implemented **SMART on FHIR** for enhanced healthcare data accessibility. My solid foundation in microservices architecture, along with CI/CD automation, has enabled me to build secure applications while adapting to event-driven systems efficiently.

Additionally, I bring valuable insight into medical coding systems such as **SNOMED CT**, **LOINC**, **ICD-10**, **CPT**, and **RxNorm**, ensuring that technical implementations align with healthcare industry requirements. I am adept at developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, giving a competitive edge to my projects in predictive analytics and intelligent automation.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver healthcare technology solutions that meet both organizational objectives and regulatory requirements.
